name: Alice!
description:
『ALICE !』 is the defense shooting game. It utilized the roguelike system a little bit for nice New Game Plus features. Even as the main character, Alice alone cannot defend the castle by herself. So, it has the feeling of a simulation game as the game progresses. Above all, the most important part is the story of the main character, Alice, since we are all bound to climb the stairs of growth. Ah! Don’t take it too seriously. Play hard, Casually enjoy the story. Relax! Relax!

What should I do?

  • Pick up your weapon! Take your breath and aim steadily. The enemies are coming!
  • Upgrade your weapons! Upgrade them as you wish. Evolve them and place MODs in your sockets!
  • Choose your skills! It may not always give you the skill you want, but you know. Isn’t that how the world is?
  • Hire BUDDY! You cannot defend the castle by yourself. BUDDY can equip weapons and learn skills like Alice!
